title: Pope Francis in DR Congo: A million gather for Kinshasa mass
description: This is said to be the second largest mass Pope Francis has held, after one in the Philippines in 2014.
content:
Pope Francis has celebrated one of his biggest masses, in DR Congo's capital, Kinshasa.
It is more than 37 years since a pope visited the mineral-rich but conflict-ridden country.
